title: Would changing exhust to a 2.5 second 50% damage reduction spell be enough?
body: No movement speed slow, no attack speed slow just a 50% damage reduction for 2.5 seconds.

replies.body: Exhaust is fine. It's the only tool we have to deal with fed players. It's imperative that it remains potent.
This is not making it unable to stop the damage of a highly fed player.

**I humbly disagree. The movement speed debuff is critical for kiting. The attack speed debuff directly reduces the damage a champion can output while under the effects of exhaust.**

Your proposed changes would cut the usefulness of the spell by at least 1/3rd. It's way to far. Sorry. 

Thankfully, Riot isn't planning on nerfing Exhaust anytime soon.

Nah.
It's overloaded and abusive.
It completely nullifies a champion into a minion.

If it was that bad, you'd see it as often as you see {{summoner:4}} . I simply disagree with you. 

Minions can't cast spells, your statement is completely wrong on many levels.
or... you know we can keep it as it because its the only freaking thing that can stop the horrible damage creep we have

Do not increase the damage reduction
Keep it at 40%

I'm sorry but EXHAUST should EXHAUST the target.

Slow is a must. Damage reduction not so much. It should be a 90% slow for 2 seconds and slow attack speed by half that. Why it lowers damage is beyond me. If I'm exhausted swinging my machete I don't deal less damage with it, I just swing it less often and lay down while swinging.
